title: Kase-san and Yamada, Vol. 1
description: Kase-san and Yamada go to college!Yamada is in heaven at her schoolâ€™s horticulture department, and Kase-san is training hard at the sports university. With classes and a long train ride to keep them apart, hanging out together is tough. Can they beat their busy schedules and find time for one another?
author: Hiromi Takashima
